structure.comment: The limit that is passed in should be respected when possible. The properties in the output are passed to the finalize service. If no properties are provided, the original are passed in. You could for instance pass in an FTP connection to the finalize.
structure.name: pipeline

field.comment: Probably not relevant in most cases, but we know it and it might be useful
field.name: offset

field.comment: Set to true if the limit was respected
field.name: limited
